author: Jahbari Akua
comment: First, let me say the clock is beautiful and the customization is amazing! The only issue I'm having is that it doesn't actually work as a clock. It doesn't update with the time. Sometimes it updates a couple minutes late, and sometimes it keeps up for about a half-hour, but eventually stops updating completely unless I go in the app. A restart fixes it temporarily, but it always stops working. Fix it and I'll definitely buy the in-app purchase.

author: Greg Moyes
comment: Works well, looks great but could do with the option to customise the size, amount of area it covers. It's too small for me, on my tablet. Also someone mentioned in the comments about it being available on lock screen, that would be really cool. Also also, last number on time has gone tiny for some reason?
title: Couple of things

author: Barrie McNaught
comment: The time doesn't update on my LG G Watch. In using a Nexus 6 running the latest lollipop build and the latest android wear updates for app and phone. Issue arose on new-years eve when the latest update came through. Will make a 5 when working again as I love this app.
title: LG G Watch Issue

author: Nate Johnson
comment: This is an amazing and awesome app but when chose the star wars character one thing really bothered me, their size. It made it difficult to read the time quite a bit. But if you could make the characters smaller or move them a little or even give a size option it would help a lot.
title: Character size

comment: Love the looks and customization options, but in the Moto 360 there's no way to reposition the date widget to the top - instead it's hidden by the watches' black bar at the bottom
title: Looks great but not perfect for round watches

author: karma carnelian
comment: I love the look of this on my LG G watch and I adore the customization options but it doesn't display the correct time which makes it not very useful for a watch. A minor fault I find annoying is I can't make it display the date as dd/mm/yyyy; checking & unchecking the mm/dd/your box has no effect. A real shame as it deserves 5 stars if not for these issues.
title: Love it but the time is frozen

author: tayfun
comment: I've been using it since it came out. But I'd like to be  able to put this on my lockscreen too. I tried but it doesn't seem possible, or is it?
title: I really love this widget

author: James
comment: I've used this clock in the past and I really dig it. So much so that I believe I paid to remove the adware. I I had since I switched phones and had not reinstalled it. I just got a Smartwatch for Christmas and decided that I would install it again. Well I did not see a way to restore my turn off ads options, so I wound up rebuying remove ads. A couple of days gone by and now my SmartWatches time keeps freezing. If I switch watch faces or open the app on my phone it will update but then it gets stuck on that new time. Please help. I have an LG G6 phone and third gen Fossil smartwatch.

author: Matt Buscemi
comment: Awesome app had for a long time however the time freezes on 4x1 with newest update on lg g watch. The developer seems active though so im sure a fix will come soon!  Edit: Thanks for the reply Android wear version 5.0.1 build # LWX48P

reply.author: Nasc
reply.content: Thanks for your feedback. What android version do you have on your watch? (Android 5+ or Android 4+)

title: Great (Bug found)

author: Ana Medusa
comment: Works perfectly after uninstalling system app One Clean (root only) that killed the background process and stopped the time. Would be awesome if we could use a custom color from a color picker or an image! Great widget, my favorite clock design of all time.

author: Madison Peace
comment: Love this clock and I've used it for a long time but sadly I've just upgraded to a new phone the LG G4 and would hopefully like to see adjustable sizes for the widget in the next update specifically 5x2 👏
title: Adjustable size for widget

author: Eddy Bae
comment: I have had this app for about 5 years now and nothing else compares to it. Its stylish, it's functional, it's light weight and it will cook a chicken tetrazzini and steal yo man.
title: Best clock on the market

author: kevin0carl
comment: Its a few minutes off and cannot see date on moto 360.
title: Not very functional but looks nice

author: Ethan Collins
comment: I love this widget. The only thing that could make it better would be if it would work on the lock screen.
title: Extremely nice, but...

author: Gerardo Méndez
comment: Numbers are wrong displayed and time is not updating. Please fix
title: Not optimized for the moto 360

author: Rose DeFanti
comment: I really really like this app, but it's been rendering the clock wrong to where the first three numbers are normal size, but the fourth is tiny, as if it was part of the second counter. Please fix.
title: Bug

author: Ashley Ward
comment: Love this. Great design and good customisation options. However, only 4 stars because on my phone it seems to be displaying pm when its actually am. A funny quirk I'm sure I'll grow to adore :p

author: Nubs4Dayz
comment: Please can you help me? The time isn't updating. I really want to use this widget because it's awesome but if it keeps doing this, I will have to delete it. So please help.

author: Ricky Xiong
comment: It would be perfect if we could have both the hour and minute each open an app on click, instead of the whole widget opening only one app!
title: Great but quick suggestion!

author: S D
comment: What happened to the donate version I paid for? Wanted to install it on a new tablet, but cannot find the donate version.

author: Jorge Antonio Garza Peña
comment: Everything else is great, but that bug make the watch face completely useless. What's the point of a clock that is not on time? Please fix. Using nexus 5
title: Time does not update with LG G Watch

author: Bryce Fewster
comment: Lol why not call this voxel clock, good app tho.

author: Ian Drew
comment: As other have said, with the latest update the time is not updating. I have Galaxy S5 and Gear Live. Never had any issues until now.
title: Time not updating.

author: Dante Sellitto
comment: I actually really love this watch face. The customization is in depth and it really allows the user to express themselves.
title: Works Great On My Zenwatch 3

author: Isabelle Gautier Offerdahl
comment: I really like that watch face! I just wish the date was bigger and maybe in the same font as the time. The geek characters could be bigger too.

author: Tony Minsent
comment: Doesn't update the time. Happens constantly.
title: Clock Freezes.

author: j man
comment: Really awesome there are alot of cool option's and it really works bit can you add a battery widget and a option for fnaf
title: Really cool but...

author: CuteyGirl GamingYT
comment: The time wont change
title: Time Glitch

author: Jake Noway
comment: Time doesn't update on sony sw3 watch unless u open the app on the phone and then close it
title: Looks good..thats it

author: Ciara Brennan
comment: Wow... just wow. First app I ever bought on my first phone when I was ten..... Last app I bought on my new phone 3 years later...
title: Great

author: memestar
comment: I love this app it is so cool with the superheroes and star wars characters I don't have a problem with it
title: Great

author: Dan Smith
comment: They fixed my previous issue and even put in some new colors. I highly recommend this.

author: Ziad Karson
comment: When I opened my widgets list it isn't there.I am using Lenovo A319.
title: Doesn't appear

author: Oguzhan Uzman
comment: It is awesome but on round screen not working properly. Also date alignment not working.
title: Support round screen & date alignment not working

author: Wyatt Lagerquist
comment: Plz add a red, yellow, green color for the clocks other than that great job!!
title: Love the app/widget!

author: Angelica Cervantes
comment: So awesome. The customization is great and I just love the geek theme. Goes perfectly with my 8 bit theme.

author: Shashank Parsewar
comment: Need to fix the size of watch face on android as the clock size is very small
title: Its ok

author: SarahTheSans 12
comment: I tried it didn't work!
title: You can't set it!?!?!?

author: Yash Bindal
comment: Does not update time in the widget... 😣being using redmi note3

author: Donna Anita Black
comment: Awesome app. Tho wish cld mke the widget smaller, still awesome tho.
title: Great.
